From: David Goodwin <dgoodwin@...>
Subject: Postdoc Opportunity at Caltech
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=44728387
X-Yahoo-Profile: dggoodwin

I am looking for a postdoc to work on a new program focused on 
developing computational tools for modeling electrochemical systems, 
including but not limited to solid oxide fuel cells.  This is a 
collaborative program between Caltech, Colorado School of Mines, Fluent 
Inc., and NRL.  The work will make heavy use of Cantera in C++ and 
Python, and will require strong programming / software skills, coupled 
with a strong background in chemistry, chemical engineering, materials 
science, and/or applied physics. Experience with modeling reactive 
systems (combustion, CVD, fuel cells, ...) is desirable.  The position 
is available essentially immediately.

Anyone who is potentially interested should contact me directly 
(dgoodwin@...).
